speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I hope you're doing well today.

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that. You have a balance of $250 on your account. How would you like to proceed with the payment today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That works for us. Would you like to make the payment over the phone or online?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will send you a link to your email for the online payment. Thank you for your time today, John.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I appreciate the help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
